name: Sai Defects
description:
Sai Defects

An action puzzler about a gnoll named Sai who Defects from his faction. Fighting his way past his enemies raises their Alarm. Maybe he can outwit them instead?

Escape the Fortress with lower Alarm, higher health, and a faster time to improve your final score!

Controls
  • Move: WASD
  • Attack: Left click (in a direction)
  • Restart: R
Troubleshooting

The game may take 5-10 seconds to load (there's no loading screen). If the game / audio has issues, try refreshing the page or using a different browser (Firefox seems to perform worse).

Credits
  • Pyrious: Code, levels, & art
  • Abledbody: Sounds, animations, art, & code contributions
  • Historia: Music
  • Cidartha: Code contributions
  • Open Sans and Jaywalk fonts

Made with in 9 days for Bevy Jam 3!
